blog.name: spider-boiii
blog.title: PeTeR kNoWs SpIdErMan
blog.description: Clare/18/Just a moron who loves Spiderman. If @ah-beans-man follows you that is she and she is me

summary:
It was not a good day. 
Pepper had been up all morning with food poisoning from a place Tony had picked,
Happy had been late...
body:
It was not a good day.

Pepper had been up all morning with food poisoning from a place Tony had picked,

Happy had been late which made Tony late for his meeting with a new company he was supposed to be partnering with,

He ended up losing the deal with them anyway,

He ripped his favorite pants,

And the pasta he made for lunch was burnt.

Tony just wanted to hop into bed and sleep off this whole terrible day, but he knew he couldn’t.

Peter had called earlier and asked him if he could come to the compound after school.

Tony tried to tell him no but he kept insisting, and how was Tony supposed to say no to Peter anyway.

Sometime during the day Tony had developed an excruciating headache that not even extra strength Tylenol could fix, and when Peter hopped into the lab he found Tony trying to drink the pain away with a clear liquid.

“Mr. Stark?”

Tony saw him looking at the glass

“Relax kid it’s just water”

It was not

“Oh alright well I heard you were having a bad day and I always say laughter is the best medicine so I brought a book of 690 jokes and I thought we could go through all of them until you felt better!”

Tony chuckled. Oddly enough when Peter had come in the room his headache had gone away. But only slightly.

After working on the suit for about an hour, or as Peter would put it 47 jokes later, Peters face lit up.

“Oh I had an idea in chemistry today! So obviously my grip already works through the suit but if we put little microscopic holes in the suit do you think the grip could go even farther and I could hold myself up even easier?”

“That’s actually a great idea, the execution might be a little difficult but we could definitely give it a try on the next version. Nice work kiddo.”

Peter beamed

“Thanks Dad!”

They both froze

They sat there in silence for what felt like an hour but in reality was about 2 minutes

Tony glanced at Peter

The kid was as red as a cherry

He saw Tony looking at him

“I SUDDENLY HAVE DIARRHEA” Peter screamed and ran out of the room

As soon as the door closed Tony started smiling and laughing.

He couldn’t feel his headache anymore and anything that had happened earlier in the day was so far out of his mind it’s like it happened in a different universe.

Peter came back a couple minutes later with hints of red still in his cheeks

“Mr Stark I’m really sorry about that I-“

Tony cut him off

“It’s all right…”

Peter let out a sigh of release

“…son”

Peters eyes shot over to Tony

He had a smirk on his face and had gone back to working on the new suit.

It was a good day.

( @notquitedeadyet thank you for the idea!!! You’re a true star!!!)

blog.name: burnin-up-abible
blog.description: Not going to debate with a bunch of stangers online

summary: Instead of T*ny adopting Peter headcanons here are some about Peter and Aunt May
body:
Instead of T*ny adopting Peter headcanons here are some about Peter and Aunt May

  • They have movie nights every week sometimes Ned comes over and when Peter becomes better friends with MJ she starts coming too
  • Before his parents died he was already close with May and Ben they would go on picnics and take him to the zoo or the New York Hall of Science
  • May loves when Peter has friends over he didn’t laugh much when Ben died and she missed the sound

I never do these I don’t know how I feel about it but I was sick of Ir*ndad headcanons so feel free to add to it
